articles.description: Ponniyen Selvan Is Wreaking Havoc At The Box Office On Monday With Collections Which Are Simply Unbelievable. It Is Making A Mockery Of Existing Record, Obliterating Them By Around 50 Per Cent.
articles.content: Ponniyen Selvan is wreaking havoc at the box office on Monday with collections which are simply unbelievable. The film is all set to collect Rs. 15 crores plus in Tamil Nadu today and may go as high … [+2440 chars]
